title: RAND Experts Take to Twitter Spaces for Live Conversation About the 1-Year Anniversary of Russia's Full-Scale Invasion ...
descriptions: As the anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine approaches, RAND will bring together several of its top experts for a live, moderated conversation on Twitter Spaces. Experts will discuss the past 12 months of war and the paths that lie ahead from a diplomatic, military, and geopolitical standpoint.

sub_content.What: As the anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine approaches, RAND will bring together several of its top experts for a live, moderated conversation on Twitter Spaces. Experts will discuss the past 12 months of war and the paths that lie ahead from a diplomatic, military, and geopolitical standpoint.

sub_content.More Information: For RAND's latest work regarding the conflict in Ukraine, please visit /latest/russia-ukraine.html. Here you'll find a curated grouping of RAND's most relevant commentaries, papers, and research reports from the past year, as well as prior Russia-Ukraine analysis.

sub_content.Interviews:
